The National Institute for Health and Care Research (NIHR) Applied Research Collaboration Greater Manchester (ARC-GM) is one of 15 regional NIHR ARCs.

REVAL is a NIHR Rapid Service Evaluation Team based at the University of Manchester.

https://sites.manchester.ac.uk/reval/

display_name: NIHR Policy Research Unit in Healthy Ageing (NIHR HAPRU)
description: The National Institute for Health and Care Research (NIHR) Policy Research Unit in Healthy Ageing aims to produce timely, high-quality evidence for policymakers. We are a collaboration between Newcastle University, The University of Manchester and the LSE.
